short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changing the text on a page to be encoded with a simple caesar shift. Should be fun when co-workers are not locking their machine

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adding this will randomly Caesar shift most text on a page.
This has no function but to annoy a co-worker who is likely leaving his machine unlocked.
